item.title: Emmy Awards 2025: What to Watch For
item.description: The nominees were announced Tuesday morning at the Television Academy’s Los Angeles headquarters.

item.title: Flash Floods Fill N.Y.C. Subway Station
item.description: Passengers on an uptown No. 1 train saw floodwaters swamping the station at 28th Street and Seventh Avenue in Manhattan.

item.title: 21 Questions About the NYC Mayoral Race, Answered
item.description: Readers from around the world asked about Assemblyman Zohran Mamdani’s surprising primary win, its effect on national politics and how The Times cover...

item.title: I’m a Genocide Scholar. I Know It When I See It.
item.description: A professor of Holocaust and genocide studies comes to a painful conclusion about Israel’s actions in Gaza.

item.title: Men Who Felled Sycamore Gap Tree Are Given Prison Sentences in U.K.
item.description: The tree, a beloved landmark that stood by Hadrian’s Wall in northern England, was found illegally cut down in 2023.
